Package net.marfgamer.jraknet.util

Class RakNetUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.util.RakNetUtils

  • public class RakNetUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to accomplish tasks related to the RakNet protocol without needing a dedicated client or server.
    Author:
    Whirvis "MarfGamer" Ardenaur

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  RakNetUtils.BootstrapHandler
      Used by createBootstrapAndSend() to wait for the packet and return it.

    • Method Detail

      • createBootstrapAndSend

        private static RakNetPacket createBootstrapAndSend​(java.net.InetSocketAddress address,
                                                   Packet packet,
                                                   long timeout,
                                                   int retries)
        Sends a raw message to the specified address for the specified amount of times in the specified interval until the packet is received or there is a timeout.
        Parameters:
        address - the address to send the packet to.
        packet - the packet to send.
        timeout - the interval of which the packet is sent.
        retries - how many times the packet will be sent.
        Returns:
        the received packet if it was received.

        Returns:
        true if the server is online.

      • parseAddress

        public static java.net.InetSocketAddress parseAddress​(java.lang.String address,
                                                      int defaultPort)
                                               throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Parses a single String as an address and port and converts it to an InetSocketAddress.
        Parameters:
        address - the address to convert.
        defaultPort - the default port to use if one is not specified.
        Returns:
        the parsed InetSocketAddress.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the address is in an invalid format or if the host cannot be found.
